title: What are the services that are provided by Allegis Global Solutions? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are two big ones: MSP - managing your vendor management systems and helping create a competitive marketplace to source temporary labor from. Reporting and analysis products included. There's enterprise and Sigma, a more standardized offering for mid-sized companies. RPO - outsourcing your recruitment process to get candidates for your employees, recruiting. Also includes reporting and analytics. The company is also moving toward total talent management, which integrates both and concentrates more on getting work done than whether employees or contractors do it.
